ygData.subject: RE: Tinkered pets, Fact or Fiction?  next on Sprin ger
ygData.msgSnippet: Where are you getting information on availability of tinkered pets?  So far as I know that remains an unverified rumor that they even exist... ... From: Monica
ygData.messageBody:
Where are you getting information on availability of tinkered pets? So far
as I know that remains an unverified rumor that they even exist...

-----Original Message-----
From: Monica Bradlee <mbradlee@...>

guys the recipe is for a level 8 pet, now I know how unbalancing that would
be
to have a level 50 wizard with a level 8 pet cause damn that pet could dish
out
some heinous damage 8-12 points of damage per swing and it could take two
whole
hits, assuming the creature actually attacks it and doesn't accidently
riposte
it to death. To get your hopes up even higher the large power module lets
you
create a level 16 pet, OHHH THE POWER I HOLD WITHIN MY HANDS!!!!! it's
novelty
for people is all but trust me as soon as I find the recipe you will see the
first warrior with a pet.

On what someone else said about enchanters, Animations don't count as pets
so
the creature dubbed "evil eye pet" is actually an animation not a pet, they
just screwed up when the text wrote it
